message: Let's be reasonable, I'm giving you a good share.
Let's split it fairly, I'm being generous considering the inflation!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Come on, my share is decreasing in value slower than yours. I'm being more than fair here.
We're running out of time, let's meet in the middle.
Time pressure is on you, not me. My share is still worth a lot more than yours. Be realistic.
I'd rather take a chance than give in to your demands.
You're taking a huge risk, I'm not. My share is still worth a significant amount, yours is dwindling fast. Be smart, accept this.
